faqItems.q1: How do I reset my password?
faqItems.a1_intro: To reset your password, follow these steps:
faqItems.a1_step1: Go to the login page and click on the "Forgot Password?" link.
faqItems.a1_step2: Enter the email address associated with your account.
faqItems.a1_step3: You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
faqItems.a1_step4: Click the link and follow the instructions to create a new password.
faqItems.a1_footer: You can also change your password at any time from Settings → Account → Change Password.
faqItems.q2: How do I join a class?
faqItems.a2_intro: There are two ways to join your class:
faqItems.a2_step1: From the Home screen: When your class is about to start, a "Join Class" button will appear on your dashboard. Click it to enter the virtual classroom instantly.
faqItems.a2_step2: From your Schedule: Go to the Schedule page, find your upcoming class, and click on your teacher's name. This will take you directly into the class session.
faqItems.a2_footer: Make sure your camera and microphone are allowed in your browser before joining.
faqItems.q3: How do I activate class reminders?
faqItems.a3_intro: Class reminders send you a push notification 10 minutes before each scheduled class. To activate them:
faqItems.a3_step3: When your browser asks for permission to send notifications, click Allow.
faqItems.a3_footer: If you previously blocked notifications, you will need to allow them in your browser settings first, then toggle the reminder off and back on to re-register.
